Hey my dudes, I am WolfieJimi, pleased to meetcha

An incorrigible delinquent. Long lost child of Kirk&Spock. FatTribble.GoldenRetriever.SpAceCadet.BastardAngel.ShipperTrash.ManicPixieDreamElf.I want to believe virtually everything I read.

Kirk/Spock+Anne/Gil+Starsky/Hutch+Crowley/Aziraphale+Mulder/Scully+Garak/Bashir+Ten/Rose+ Merry&Pippin+Moomin&Snufkin+Jesus/Judas+Morticia/Gomez+Legolas/Gimli+Xena/Gabrielle+Jeeves&(/?)Wooster+Anders/Warden Joshua Amell

blog.title: I do art and throw kindness around like confetti!
blog.description: COMMISSIONS OPEN Fanart, Portraits and Illustration, multi fandom blog with occasional real life ramblings - Safe space blog  Two rules of my blog:  #1  If you cannot be kind then be quiet, keep scrolling.   #2 I block porn blogs, if your blog is simply naked people doing this and that, don't bother following me. Mod at @weekendartmarathon, @crowleybigbang, @spnholidayreverseminibang, @wearespnfamily

title: Drowley for Valentines Day
body:
Not my usual ship I know, but I had this started and figured I’d finish it.

From On The Lemonade of the series The Misadventures of Growley and Squirrel by @thayerkerbasy

This is an “unaired” scene in the fic. It’s mentioned but not shown. So I’m showing it.  I asked Thayer what song they would sing, he decided Wild Night by  John Mellencamp & Me'Shell Ndegeocello

So have some enthused Demon Dean and some not so enthused Crowley, who lost a bet, singing karaoke.  

Crowley has a red tie cuz I don’t have a lavender marker anymore (wth? where it went, i suspect i’ll never find out)

Dean would be a microphone hog too!

“I ain’t playin’ no fancy crap. If you wanted to shoot some plain damn pool I might be game though.”

Crowley allowed a trace of a smile. “I could be persuaded to play with your balls, darling. But let’s make it interesting. How about, winner gets to choose what the loser drinks next round.”

Of course Dean couldn’t let it stand at that. “Screw that. If I win, you do a round of karaoke.”

Not what he’d expected, but acceptable. “And if I win, we upgrade to a better quality establishment.”

If the raised eyebrows were anything to go on, his counteroffer hadn’t been expected either. After a moment’s consideration, Dean shrugged and nodded. “Alright. Better go stake a claim on a table then.

summary: “But the Great Plan can only be a tiny part of the overall ineffability,” said Crowley. “You can’t be certain that what’s...
body: “But the Great Plan can only be a tiny part of the overall ineffability,” said Crowley. “You can’t be certain that what’s happening right now isn’t exactly right, from an ineffable point of view.”

blog.title: They Handed Me The Moon
blog.description: Paige, 23, she/her, queer. This blog is for whatever catches my interest, which for now is primarily Good Omens

summary: Crowley and Aziraphale being able to perform miracles sure is Something because at all times one half of my brain is...
body: Crowley and Aziraphale being able to perform miracles sure is Something because at all times one half of my brain is going “despite their flaws and self-delusions, Aziraphale and Crowley’s relationship to each other, love for the earth, and penchant for nuanced thought makes them more equipped to wield power than any of their angelic or demonic counterparts. In this essay I will,” while the other half is just screaming “oH MY GOODNESS why would anyone give these idiots magic powers someone stop them—”

title: Supernatural fans are so salty...
body:
…About the nearly 2 years ago departure of Crowley, played by Mark Sheppard.  Somehow a rumor got started about him returning in S14, He has clearly said no he won’t come back since he left.  Then I realize people still think he was treated badly on the show or by the writers… Where the hell are you getting that information? Are you making it up? Making up something because you don’t like a certain writer or producer for whatever reason?

 Every tweet, every event he has done since he talks about how wonderful everyone is that is involved in SPN, how he felt so loved by the whole team and the fans.   At the end of every season the producers ask/asked Misha and Mark S if they wanted return for the next season after the renewal was announced.  At the end of Season 12, Mark said no.

He has even said so several times why… in fact if you were paying attention to con videos from the fall of 2016, when season 12 started airing he would talk about how lucky he felt that the character was still well loved and how the writers still gave him good material even though he himself thought Crowley had outlasted his stay saying that Season 8 was the last time Crowley was needed as a character.  He said he was grateful to be liked so much but he was looking forward to doing something new in the future… he was saying that all through the cons at the time. I knew he was leaving at the end of season 12 because he wanted to, probably by October of 2016. He is over 50 years old, has a daughter under 5, plus the two older boys, wanted to get back into playing drums with bands.  He wanted to spend more time with them and he was probably tired from so much flying.  He choose to leave SPN because he felt it was time, the writers/producers are being respectful to his character because they could have given Crowley a new vessel but they didn’t.  They easily could have a new Crowley with the AU…. But Crowley belongs to Mark Sheppard. 

In fact I know he is loved by the writers and producers because of all the love they tweeted to him when it was officially announced he wasn’t returning. And again recently when his father died. There are plenty of obvious outpourings of love for him from tptb that the fact that some of you think he was treated badly is ridiculous, plus having friends in the industry who know the situation say there is nothing but love for him and he was treated like a lead, when he wasn’t one and that does not happen usually.   

The only organization Mark Sheppard is upset with is Creation Entertainment the company that does the US and Canada stand alone SPN Cons.  He says they are too expensive for fans. He is used to doing Cons that have multi fandoms involved with 10s of thousands in attendance and multiple panels in different locations going on at the same time, because of higher attendance those cons do not charge as much… it makes sense.   I just don’t think he realized that right away when he said he would no longer do Creation Events… he does do other cons and speaks highly of his time on SPN.  And if I hear one more person talk about the Australia con he did shortly after SPN ended where “he was so upset and crying”  The con was outdoors and it was Australia’s winter and it was raining… he was fighting off getting sick, you could hear it in his voice… he didn’t say anything that would remotely make you think he was unhappy about anything having to do with SPN.

summary:
Me: *catching up on S14 Supernatural*
Problem: *arises*
Me: hey why don't they go ask our friendly demon friend next door, the...
body:
Me: *catching up on S14 Supernatural*

Problem: *arises*

Me: hey why don’t they go ask our friendly demon friend next door, the king, the one and only, the bestest character of this show -

Me: …

Me: … wait

Me: They can’t.

It’s been over a season, over a year and I’m STILL BITTER about it

trail.content_raw:
Me: *catching up on S14 Supernatural*

Problem: *arises*

Me: hey why don’t they go ask our friendly demon friend next door, the king, the one and only, the bestest character of this show -

Me: …

Me: … wait

Me: They can’t.

It’s been over a season, over a year and I’m STILL BITTER about it

title: When Miracles Fail
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TVZ2p6

by justsimplymeagain

His attempt at killing Metatron had failed and Dean… Dean was dead. And then he wasn’t.
